name: channel_unarchive
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community A channel was unarchived  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					channels:read 				 The channel_unarchive event is sent to all connections for a team when a team channel is unarchived. Clients can use this to update their local list of channels.
